channel.title: [REQ.] Need Allstarscape Source with Thread fix
channel.description:
The title says it all, i need an allstarscape, whitescape, or pimpscape source with single thread (graham's thread per client) . If someone could kindly pm me or post back with a link that would be nice.
And i'll make sure rep ya.
IK this is probably againts rules, but don't post back saying. "You can't request downloads" <- that right there isn't helping at all and is actually just spam, if you cant help, then don't post;its simple.

item.title: [REQ.] Need Allstarscape Source with Thread fix
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

a good way to find a server with TPC remove is to go to the download section and type in the search bar “thread per client”. Though I must say it is old and you should just use something like Runesource, Hyperion, Apollo, RS377, or another framework which will perform a lot better out of the box then having to fix the massive amount of problems in the current WinterLove bases.

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ.] Need Allstarscape Source with Thread fix

item.title: [REQ.] Need Allstarscape Source with Thread fix
item.dc:creator: @RS2006 RS2006
item.description:
@RS2006 wrote:

FusionX:

here : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536116.0.html

Thanks for trying, but this source doesn’t have graham’s thread per client fix. So I can still be nulled/crashed by a program (Natalie’s server nuller)

Read full topic
